title: Spicy delicious chicken wings
author: John Smith
description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

directions.title: Season the wings
directions.description: Toss chicken wings with chili powder, garlic powder, salt, and pepper in a large bowl until evenly coated.

directions.title: Bake
directions.description: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Arrange wings on a baking sheet and bake for 45-50 minutes until crispy.

directions.title: Sauce
directions.description: Toss the baked wings in hot sauce before serving.

title: Big and Juicy Wagyu Beef Cheeseburger
author: Jane Doe

directions.title: Grill Patty
directions.description: Season beef patty with salt and pepper. Grill over high heat for 3-4 minutes per side for medium-rare.

directions.title: Assemble
directions.description: Toast the bun. Place lettuce, tomato, patty, and cheese on the bun. Add condiments if desired.

title: Fresh Lime Roasted Salmon with Ginger Sauce
author: Alice

directions.title: Marinate
directions.description: Mix ginger, soy sauce, and lime juice. Marinate salmon for 15 minutes.

directions.title: Roast
directions.description: Place salmon on baking sheet with lime slices. Roast at 400°F for 12-15 minutes.

title: Strawberry Oatmeal Pancake with Honey Syrup
author: Bob

directions.title: Make Batter
directions.description: Blend oats into flour. Mix with milk, egg, and baking powder.

directions.title: Cook
directions.description: Pour batter onto hot griddle. Cook until bubbles form, then flip.

directions.title: Serve
directions.description: Top with fresh strawberries and honey syrup.

title: Fresh and Healthy Mixed Mayonnaise Salad
author: Charlie

directions.title: Chop
directions.description: Wash and chop all vegetables.

directions.title: Mix
directions.description: Toss vegetables in a large bowl. Stir in mayonnaise and season with salt/pepper.

directions.title: Mix
directions.description: Combine chicken, breadcrumbs, egg, and spices. Form into balls.

directions.title: Cook
directions.description: Pan fry meatballs until browned. Add cream cheese sauce and simmer.

directions.title: Prepare Batter
directions.description: Prepare pancake batter according to package instructions. Fold in blueberries.

directions.title: Cook
directions.description: Cook pancakes on a griddle. Serve topped with orange slices and syrup.

title: The Best Easy One Pot Chicken and Rice
author: Frank

directions.title: Sear Chicken
directions.description: Sear chicken thighs in a pot until golden. Remove.

directions.title: Cook Rice
directions.description: Sauté onion, add rice and broth. Return chicken to pot. Simmer covered for 20 mins.

title: The Creamiest Creamy Chicken and Bacon Pasta
author: Grace

directions.title: Cook Meat
directions.description: Cook bacon until crispy. Remove. Cook chicken in bacon fat.

directions.title: Sauce
directions.description: Add cream and parmesan to pan. Toss with cooked pasta, chicken, and bacon.
